contest-event.event-date:
July 6, 1895 D Glasgow Contest
Glasgow Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
glasgow-contest
None
Carnival, South Side, Glasgow Exposition and Scottish Fete 6 bands competed Prizes: £22, £15, £10, £6, £4 10s In the evening there was the usual parachuting - Miss Beaumont making a very successful descent in the neighbourhood of Hogganfield. Upon alighting she was presented with bouquets of flowers and escorted part of her way home by a local brass band.
April 15, 2012, 10:17 p.m. June 20, 2019, 9:14 p.m.
1 Kirkcaldy Trades Richard Marsden
2 Bo'ness and Carriden Band Adam Bell
3 Clydebank Burgh Band Richard Marsden
4 Alloa Burgh James Robinson
5 Bonnybridge & District Charles Woodcock
6 Cambusbarron James Robinson
